languages.text: "Излагаю доклад. Зарегистрировав многочисленные грех-сбои в работе служебных сервиторов, а также рапорты о возмущении корабельных систем, я приняла решение об исполнении техноэкзорцизма. Ритуальные циклы уже начались на всех палубах и продлятся еще в течении сорока дней". {n}Мастер двигателя медлит.{/n} "Ритуалы проходят успешно. Однако их начало сопровождалось скверно-проявлениями. Десятки сервиторов и даже несколько младших технопослушников были утилизированы".

traits.locale_text: "Излагаю доклад. Зарегистрировав многочисленные грех-сбои в работе служебных сервиторов, а также рапорты о возмущении корабельных систем, я приняла решение об исполнении техноэкзорцизма. Ритуальные циклы уже начались на всех палубах и продлятся еще в течении сорока дней". {n}Мастер Двигателя медлит.{/n} "Ритуалы проходят успешно. Однако их начало сопровождалось скверно-проявлениями. Десятки сервиторов и даже несколько младших технопослушников были утилизированы".
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."
languages.original_text: "Излагаю доклад. Зарегистрировав многочисленные грех-сбои в работе служебных сервиторов, а также рапорты о возмущении корабельных систем, я приняла решение об исполнении техноэкзорцизма. Ритуальные циклы уже начались на всех палубах и продлятся еще в течении сорока дней". {n}Мастер двигателя медлит.{/n} "Ритуалы проходят успешно. Однако их начало сопровождалось скверно-проявлениями. Десятки сервиторов и даже несколько младших технопослушников были утилизированы".

languages.text: 「報告提示。サーヴィター維持オペレーションにおける数々の不法な失敗および船のシステム障害に関する報告が登録された後、技術払いの儀式が必要であるという結論に達した。儀式のサイクルはすでに全てのデッキで開始されており、さらに40日間行われる」{n}ドライブマスターは少しの間躊躇った。{/n}「儀式は着実なペースで進んでいる。しかし、最初の段階で汚染現象に見舞われた。多くのサーヴィター、それに数名の下級テック・アコライトですら処分対象であった」
languages.original_text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."

traits.locale_text: 「報告提示。サーヴィター維持オペレーションにおける数々の不法な失敗および船のシステム障害に関する報告が登録された後、技術払いの儀式が必要であるという結論に達した。儀式のサイクルはすでに全てのデッキで開始されており、さらに40日間行われる」{n}ドライブマスターは少しの間躊躇った。{/n}「儀式は着実なペースで進んでいる。しかし、最初の段階で汚染現象に見舞われた。多くのサーヴィター、それに数名の下級テック・アコライトですら処分対象であった」
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: “正在提交报告。在记录了大量的维修人员操作故障和飞船系统紊乱的报告后，我决定必须执行技术仪式。仪式已经在所有甲板上开始，预计将持续四十天。”{n}驱动大师犹豫了片刻。{/n}“仪式正在稳步进行。然而，仪式的起始阶段伴随着污染现象。数十名机仆，甚至几名初级技工都被处决了。”
languages.original_text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."

traits.locale_text: “正在提交报告。在记录了大量的维修人员操作故障和飞船系统紊乱的报告后，我决定必须执行技术仪式。仪式已经在所有甲板上开始，预计将持续四十天。”{n}驱动大师犹豫了片刻。{/n}“仪式正在稳步进行。然而，仪式的起始阶段伴随着污染现象。数十名奴工，甚至几名初级技工都被处决了。”
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: "Präsentiere Bericht. Nachdem im Betrieb der Wartungsservitoren eine Vielzahl von Übeltat-Fehlfunktionen aufgetreten ist und es Berichte über Störungen in den Systemen des Schiffs gab, bin ich zu der Entscheidung gekommen, dass ein Ritus des Techsorzismus durchgeführt werden muss. Die ritualistischen Zyklen haben bereits auf allen Decks begonnen und werden noch vierzig Tage lang andauern." {n}Der Triebwerksmeister zögert einen Moment lang.{/n} "Die Rituale schreiten gut voran. Doch die ersten Phasen wurden von Makel-Phänomenen begleitet. Dutzende von Servitoren und selbst einige niedere Tech-Akolythen wurden der Entsorgung unterzogen."
languages.original_text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Präsentiere Bericht. Nachdem im Betrieb der Wartungsservitoren eine Vielzahl von Übeltat-Fehlfunktionen aufgetreten ist und es Berichte über Störungen in den Systemen des Schiffs gab, bin ich zu der Entscheidung gekommen, dass ein Ritus des Techsorzismus durchgeführt werden muss. Die ritualistischen Zyklen haben bereits auf allen Decks begonnen und werden noch vierzig Tage lang andauern." {n}Der Triebwerksmeister zögert einen Moment lang.{/n} "Die Rituale schreiten gut voran. Doch die ersten Phasen wurden von Makel-Phänomenen begleitet. Dutzende von Servitoren und selbst einige niedere Tech-Akolythen wurden der Entsorgung unterzogen."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: « Exposé de la situation. Après avoir enregistré un grand nombre d'échecs dans les opérations de maintenance des servitors et de perturbations dans les systèmes du vaisseau, je suis arrivée à la conclusion qu'un rite de techxorcisme devait être accompli. Les cycles rituels ont déjà commencé sur tous les ponts et se poursuivront pendant quarante jours. » {n}La maîtresse des machines hésite un instant.{/n} « Les rituels se déroulent à un rythme soutenu. Cependant, des phénomènes d'altération sont apparus au cours des premières phases. Nous avons perdu des dizaines de servitors ainsi que plusieurs techno-acolytes subalternes. »
languages.original_text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."

traits.locale_text: « Exposé de la situation. Après avoir enregistré un grand nombre d'échecs dans les opérations de maintenance des servitors et de perturbations dans les systèmes du vaisseau, je suis arrivée à la conclusion qu'un rite de techsorcisme devait être accompli. Les cycles rituels ont déjà commencé sur tous les ponts et se poursuivront pendant quarante jours. » {n}La maîtresse des machines hésite un instant.{/n} « Les rituels se déroulent à un rythme soutenu. Cependant, des phénomènes d'altération sont apparus au cours des premières phases. Nous avons perdu des dizaines de servitors ainsi que plusieurs techno-acolytes subalternes. »
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: «Presentando informe. Tras registrar un gran número de maleficencias en las operaciones de los servidores de mantenimiento y varios casos de averías en los sistemas de la nave, llegué a la conclusión de que debía oficiarse un ritual de tecnoexorcismo. Los ciclos litúrgicos ya han dado comienzo en todas las cubiertas y proseguirán durante otros cuarenta días». {n}La maestra de motores titubea un instante.{/n} «Los rituales marchan a un ritmo constante. No obstante, en sus primeras etapas se produjeron algunos fenómenos corruptos. Tuvimos que deshacernos de docenas de servidores e incluso varios tecnoacólitos de baja categoría».
languages.original_text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."

traits.locale_text: «Presentando informe. Tras registrar un gran número de maleficencias en las operaciones de los servidores de mantenimiento y varios casos de averías en los sistemas de la nave, llegué a la conclusión de que debía oficiarse un ritual de tecnoexorcismo. Los ciclos litúrgicos ya han dado comienzo en todas las cubiertas y proseguirán durante otros cuarenta días». {n}La maestra de motores titubea un instante.{/n} «Los rituales marchan a un ritmo constante. No obstante, en sus primeras etapas se produjeron algunos fenómenos corruptos. Tuvimos que deshacernos de docenas de servidores e incluso varios tecnoacólitos de baja categoría».
traits.speaker: EngineMaster

languages.text: "Rapor veriliyor. Bakım hizmetörlerinin faaliyetlerinde meydana gelen, çok sayıda günah arızası bildirimi ile geminin sistemlerindeki arıza raporlarına istinaden bir teknokovuç ayini düzenlenmesi kararına vardım. Hâlihazırda tüm güvertelerde başlamış bulunan ayin döngüleri, kırk gün boyunca devam edecek." {n}Motor Üstadı, bir anlığına tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Ayinler istikrarlı bir hızda devam ediyor. Ancak ilk aşamalarda kusur fenomeni yaşandı. Onlarca hizmetörün yanı sıra birkaç ast tekno havari de imha edildi."
languages.original_text: "Presenting report. After registering a large number of malefaction-failures in the operations of maintenance servitors and reports of disturbances in the ship's systems, I arrived at the decision that a rite of techsorcism must be performed. The ritualistic cycles have already begun on all decks and will continue for another forty days." {n}The Drivesmaster hesitates for a moment.{/n} "The rituals are proceeding at a steady pace. However, their first stages were accompanied by taint-phenomena. Dozens of servitors and even several junior tech-acolytes were subjected to disposal."

traits.locale_text: "Rapor veriliyor. Bakım hizmetörlerinin faaliyetlerinde meydana gelen, çok sayıda günah arızası bildirimi ve geminin sistemlerindeki bozulma raporlarına istinaden bir teknokovuç ayini düzenlenmesi kararına vardım. Ayin döngüleri, hâlihazırda tüm güvertelerde başladı ve kırk gün boyunca devam edecek." {n}Motor Üstadı bir anlığına tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Ayinler istikrarlı bir hızda devam ediyor. Ancak ilk aşamalarda kusur fenomeni yaşandı. Düzinelerce hizmetörün yanı sıra birkaç ast tekno havari de imha edildi."
traits.speaker: EngineMaster
